6. Professional Experience 
06/2018 - Now 
React Native Developer 
Projects 
§ 
Unsafe Act Unsafe Condition (UAUC) 
§ 
My Events 
Team Size 
10 
Responsibilities 
§ 
Working with customer discussing technology as a Solution Architect 
and then in charge of the whole project implementation including 
application development, implementation, deployment on IOS & 
Android. 
§ 
Manage and support team members. 
Description 
§ 
UAUC: Based on a web application running on production, we 
continue to build a mobile application using React Native on Android 
& iOS. The application allows user to report status of equipment or 
unnormal behaviour of staff. 
§ 
My Events: Events registration using QR ticket and management. 
Based on available APIs, we built an application for presentations & 
training Petronas developers about React Native and Azure features. 
Technologies Used 
React Native, Azure App Center, Azure Translator, Fastlane 
Tools 
Visual Studio Code, XCode, Android Studio, Microsoft Azure DevOps, 
Sourcetree, Git 
03/2018 – 06/2018 
Frontend Developer 
Project 
My File 
Team Size 
8 
Responsibilities 
§ 
Working with customer as a contact point from customer site. 
§ 
Build new function and implement request change, review code. 
§ 
Mentor junior members and support team members. 
Description 
My File is a web application for file management which allows users to 
store, sync and share files with ease. 
Technologies Used 
AngularJS, Gulp, JQuery, Bootstrap, SCSS, .NET Core 2.0, MS SQL Server 
Tools 
Visual Studio Code, Visual Studio 2018, SSMS 2017, Git, Sourcetree, 
Bitbucket, JIRA. 
05/2018 – 08/2018 
Software Developer 
Project 
My Memo 
Team Size 
12 
Responsibilities 
§ 
Migrate database from old to new system, redesign/normalize 
database, build tools to upload a half million files to sever. 
§ 
Support Frontend members. 
Description 
My Memo allows user to send mail to other users within the Petronas 
group. It also supports features for users such as Security Level, approval 
process of a memo. 
Technologies Used 
AngularJS, Gulp, .NET Core 2.0, MS SQL Server, Bootstrap, SCSS, jQuery 
Tools 
Visual Studio Code, Visual Studio 2017, SSMS 2017, Sourcetree, Git, 
Bitbucket, JIRA 
11/2017 - 03/2018 
React Native Developer 
Projects 
Whip MTB 
Team Size 
8 
Responsibilities 
§ 
Participate in full software development lifecycle from design to 
deployment. 
§ 
Configure and maintain website server and API on Ubuntu 16.04. 
§ 
Manage and support team members. 
Description 
Whip MTB is a social network mobile application which connect with riders 
and help users discover new riding spots all over the world. For details, it 
allows users to upload and share videos, photos and reviews with a lot of 
brands, riders, magazines and events. 
Technologies Used 
React Native, Fastlane 
Tools 
Visual Studio Code, XCode, Android Studio, Sourcetree, Git, Bitbucket, JIRA 
09/2017 - 01/2018 
Full-stack Developer 
Project 
Appy Guide (Website & Mobile) 
Team Size 
8 
Responsibilities 
§ 
Build structure, implement app based on UI/UX Design, review code 
and deploy app to Google store and Apple store. 
§ 
Mentor junior members and support team members.  
§ 
Configure and maintain website server and API on Ubuntu 16.04. 
Description 
AppyGuide is a platform that connects travellers to great stories created 
by experts. AppyGuide is made up of two components: 
- 
Mobile app: Allow travellers access to audio guides, or as we call 
them “stories”, on their own mobile devices (IOS and Android). 
- 
Content Management System: Allow storytellers to register, create 
stories, manage content and receive detailed analytics on stories sold 
and reviewed by their listeners. 
Technologies Used 
React Native, Fastlane, VueJS, Webpack, Bootstrap, SCSS, MongoDB 
Tools 
Visual Studio Code, XCode, Android Studio, Studio 3T, Redis Desktop 
Manager, Sourcetree, Git, Bitbucket, JIRA 
08/2017 - 11/2017 
Software Developer 
Projects 
Next Good Thing (NGT) 
Team Size 
3 
Responsibilities 
§ 
Implement application based on UI/UX Design, review code, fix bug. 
§ 
Manage and support team members. 
Description 
Next Good Thing is a web application for real estate business connecting 
sellers and buyers and support payment tracking. 
Technologies Used 
HapiJS, AngularJS, Webpack, Bootstrap, Mongoose, Git 
Tools 
Visual Studio Code, Studio 3T, Redis Desktop Manager,  Sourcetree, Git, 
GitLab, Trello 
04/2017 - 07/2017 
React Native Developer 
Projects 
Saigon Ship 
Team Size 
3 
Responsibilities 
Build structure, implement app based on UI/UX Design, review code and 
deploy app to Google store and Apple store. 
Description 
Saigon Ship is a mobile application for delivery parties to manage shipping. 
Technologies Used 
React Native, Fastlane 
Tools 
Visual Studio Code, XCode, Android Studio, Sourcetree, Git, Github 
02/2017 - 09/2017 
Software Developer 
Projects 
LORA 
Team Size 
7 
Responsibilities 
Implement new feature, request change, create document and fix bugs. 
Projects 
LORA is an ecommerce website for cosmetics brands. 
Technologies Used 
Demandware, Pipeline, Sandbox 
Tools 
Sublime Text, Eclipse, Sourcetree, Git, Bitbucket, JIRA, Trello… 
09/2015 - 02/2017 
Android Programmer 
Project 
Asphalt 8, Ultimate Spiderman, Dragon Mania Legends, Disney Magic 
Kingdoms, Modern Combat… 
Team Size 
10 
Responsibilities 
Develop, maintain game on multi-devices, research and apply new 
technology, add new features (Advertisement, Google Adwords, Multiple-
Language, In-App Purchase, Customer Relation Management…), fix bug 
and support team. 
Description 
These mobile games are widely popular to millions of players on many 
types of games such as online/offline, strategy, MOBA, etc… 
Technologies Used 
J2ME, Java, C#, Unity, Gameloft Lib 
Tools 
Notepad++, Eclipse, Visual Studio, Tortoise SVN, Aurora (Process graphics) 
04/2015 - 08/2015 
Junior Developer 
Project 
Go Travel 
Team Size 
3 
Responsibilities 
Create design specification document/requirement specification 
document, design UI, design database, build application according to 
customer’s requirements. 
Description 
Go Travel is a web application connecting ticket agencies with tourists 
including tracking until payment completion. 
Technologies Used 
PHP, Laravel 5, jQuery, MySQL, Git 
Tools 
Sublime Text, XAMP, phpMyAdmin, Git, Github, Bracket 
11/2014 - 02/2015 
Junior Developer 
Project 
DMG 
Team Size 
3 
Responsibilities 
Create design specification document/requirement specification 
document, design UI, design database, build application according to 
customer’s requirements. 
Description 
DMG is a web application which helps users find suitable bus routes as 
well as support bus routes recommendation matching user’s destination. 
Technologies Used 
JSP, Servlet, Spring Framework 4, Apache Tomcat, MS SQL Server 
Tools 
Eclipse, SSMS 2008, Tortoise SVN, MS Visio, Mockup 
06/2014 - 10/2014 
Junior Developer 
Project 
Finding Motel 
Team Size 
3 
Responsibilities 
Create design specification document/requirement specification 
document, design UI, design database, build application according to 
customer’s requirements. 
Description 
Finding Motel is a desktop application which helps students find motels 
near Nha Trang University area. 
Technologies Used 
Avenue, MS SQL Server 
Tools 
ArcView, SSMS 2008, Tortoise SVN, Mockup 
7. Professional Rewards 
1st prize Ads Contest 2016 
Research and implement Advertisement feature 
1st prize Let Make a Game Course 2016 
Give idea and build a game using Gameloft Library 
1st prize Startup weekend Danang 2016 
Give idea, build team and develop ideas under the 
guidance of mentors then present project to convince 
jury. The contest was held by DNES - Da Nang Business 
Incubator 
8. Hobbies 
     Listening to music; Playing game; Reading; Playing football – (Best player of Football 
Championship Gameloft 2016)
